stories.title: The Red Chronicles
stories.description: A thrilling tale of mystery, courage, and discovery spanning multiple chapters.

chapters.title: Chapter 1 — The Awakening
chapters.excerpt: The adventure begins with an unexpected event that changes everything for our protagonist.

chapters.title: Chapter 2 — Shadows of the Past
chapters.excerpt: Mysteries unravel as secrets from the past come to light, challenging our hero’s courage.

chapters.title: Chapter 3 — The Hidden Path
chapters.excerpt: Choices are made, alliances tested, and the journey takes an unexpected turn into uncharted territory.
